[vc_row equal_height=”yes” type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]The All-in-One adapter combines a Beamsplitter & Digital SLR Adapter for a one-piece solution to slit lamp photography. Using interchangeable plates and mounts it can work with a wide variety of slit lamps and digital SLR cameras to capture high quality photos and video.

  • Includes a beamsplitter for a one-piece imaging solution
  • 100% light transmission to operator when the beamsplitter is not in use
  • Compatible with all APS-C and MFT cameras
  • Focus-control to fine tune your image
  • X/Y adjustment to center your view
  • Adjustable iris to increase depth of field
  • Footswitch available for Canon cameras

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_gallery type=”flexslider_slide” interval=”3″ images=”73708,72282″ img_size=”400×267″ css=”.vc_custom_1585667694164{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”#e5e5e5″ type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=””][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

All-in-One SLR Adapter

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Our preferred solution to connect a digital SLR camera to a slit lamp, the All-in-One Adapter is a one-piece solution that combines beamsplitter and SLR optics. The adapter has interchangeable mounts to work with most slit lamps and cameras.

The beamsplitter cube can easily be moved in and out of the field of view to allow 100% light transmission when not taking photographs. The adapter also has focus control, X/Y adjustment, and an adjustable iris to capture the perfect image.

The in-line design is mounted vertically to evenly distribute weight and does not impede the operator when making adjustments to the slit lamp.

Part # 8186[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs color=”white” active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”Compatibility” tab_id=”1569386751404-824b66ba-0d546c00-e1b2″][vc_column_text]

Compatible with Zeiss, Topcon, Keeler, Haag-Streit, Marco, Inami, Shin-Nippon, Takagi, Ibex, Veatch, CSO, Huvits, Nikon, and Rodenstock

Haag-Streit Disclaimer

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Regulatory” tab_id=”1569386751419-a33a2db6-6e3d6c00-e1b2″][vc_column_text]

The All-in-One Adapter is a class 1 device, and is approved to bear the CE mark.

TTI Medical is registered with the FDA and ISO 13485:2016 certified.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Warranty” tab_id=”1569387831165-1b59dea1-014a6c00-e1b2″][vc_column_text]

All of our products include a 1 year manufacturer’s warranty and support for the usable lifetime of the product.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row]
